MWC.GUI.Chart.AWT

Class AWTChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.PlainChart
      • MWC.GUI.Chart.AWT.AWTChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, CanvasType.PaintListener, Pane

    public final class AWTChart
extends PlainChart
    The Chart is a canvas placed in a panel. the majority of functionality is contained in the PlainChart parent class, only the raw comms is in this class. This is configured by setting the listeners to the chart/panel to be the listener functions defined in the parent.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
